name: Luco
bio: Lucas Han, DJ name Luco, is a San Francisco Bay Area based DJ and producer who plays variety of genres within the electronic music scene, including but not limited to tech and bass house, techno, and UK garage. Some notable venues and headliners include Marten Horger and Bijou at 1015 Folsom, Bassjackers at Temple SF, ALRT at Halcyon, and Basura Boyz at Public Works SF. He has recently released his first remix of the song Die For You by The Weeknd, which has received over 2500 plays in the first month of release on SoundCloud. As he progresses through his DJ and producer avenues, Luco is consistently finding new, interesting music to share with the community that makes you want to dance.
